flawed_nl_solution:
Tom is 32+5=<<32+5=37>>37 years old
So 7 years ago he was 37-7=<<37-7=32>>32 years old
Half of his age was 32/2=<<32/2=16>>16 years old
So 7 years ago Jim was 16+5=21
So he is now 21+7=<<21+7=28>>28 years old
That means in 2 years he will be 28+2=<<28+2=30>>30 years old
#### 30

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 32. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
